decision.description: Determines a user's access tier based on tenure, activity, and verification status.

rule.when: verified_identity == true AND account_age_days >= 90 AND monthly_transactions >= 50
rule.emit: tier = "PREMIUM" reason = "Verified user with high tenure and high activity"

rule.when: verified_identity == true AND account_age_days >= 30 AND monthly_transactions >= 10
rule.emit: tier = "STANDARD" reason = "Verified user meeting standard tenure and activity thresholds"
